features: Added support for dynamic permissions for chat, polls and plugins
fixes: Improved `<productdb-chat />` responsiveness in smaller containers
Fixed rendering issue with `<productdb-ai-transcriptions />` component
Fixed word break issue with `<productdb-chat />` component

features: You can now control the Recording notifications via configurations
Added support to pin chat messages
Added util `BreakoutRoomsManager` to manage breakout rooms without UI components
fixes: Fixed `<productdb-breakout-rooms-toggle />` where it was not operational
Fixed `<productdb-chat-message />` avatar for small screens
Fixed an issue where sidebar participant state was not in sync with the grid view
Optimized event handling for stage
Improved state handling for PiP view

features: <productdb-caption-toggle /> for toggling [captions](https://docs.productdb.io/guides/capabilities/audio/transcriptions) in the meeting
fixes: Fixed text in chat placeholder
Handle setSinkId error while playing audio
Fixed the inconsistent state of the grid view when multiple people leave the meeting
Fixed the inconsistent state of the grid pagination when multiple people leave the meeting at once.
Fixed an issue where the <productdb-grid /> was emitting an additional dyteStateUpdate event when the grid view was already in the same state.

features: New and improved <productdb-channel-selector-view /> for chat SDK
<productdb-participants /> now takes `start` and `end`  slots to render custom elements before and after the sidebar participants list.
<productdb-participant /> now takes slot to render custom action elements for the participant.

fixes: Optimize event binding to lower memory usage
Fixed an issue with `<productdb-participant-tile />` component where the tile was not showing the correct state when the meeting object was not passed to the component
Allow customizing `<productdb-participant-tile />` component from config.
Fix PiP view to show initials when video is off
Fix UI state for offline grid for livestream viewers
Handle autoplay errors for livestream player
Fix tooltip for in progress operations in the control bar

features: Support for plugins for audio rooms
Added support for [UI kit Addons](https://productdb.io/blog/ui-kit-add-ons/)
New audio visualizer for audio room grid view
Grid view now shows appropriate state when participant is offline or no one is on stage
fixes: Improved link detection in chat messages
Improved rich text support in chat messages
Sidebar becomes floating when the screen size is small
Improved Polls UI

features: `<productdb-fullscreen-toggle />` now takes a `targetElement` prop to toggle fullscreen on a specific element.
fixes: Improved the link detection to work with more links.
Fixed an issue with play audio modal which was closing on esc key press. This should not have happened, we require the user to click on the close button to enable auto-play.
Fixed an issue where the plugin access control was not working as expected for some plugins.

features: The 'more-items' slot is added to `<productdb-participant />`. You can use this slot to add action items to the participant.
fixes: Emoji picker now has a close button when the user wants to close the emoji picker.
Fixed an issue with pasting texts to chat in Safari browsers.
Fixed an issue with long device names in the settings modal.
Fixed an edge case where the `Mute all` button was not visible.
Optimized loading the first page of chat messages.
Optimized the avatar size in chat messages.
Fixed an edge case where the file name in the upload preview was overflowing the UI.
Handled an edge case in the audio playback for livestreaming meetings.
Optimized the spacing between the chat messages.
Better handling of event listeners in `<productdb-screenshare-view />` component.
Optimized polls styling.
Fixed an issue with font color in `<productdb-participant />` component.
features: Added a close button for emoji picker in `<productdb-chat-composer />` component.
New <sidebar-ui /> component that can be used to render the sidebar in your app.

fixes: Fixed an edge case where the view only mode for plugins was not working.
Fixed an issue where the links in chat messages were opening in the same tab.
Modified the controlbar items order to be more accessible.
Fixed an issue where the unread counts were flickering on the selected channel.
Fixed an edge case where the chat messages were overflowing the chat ui.
Improved the UI for chat composer.
Fixed an issue with chat composer component, where the attachment remove button placement was not correct in Safari browser.
Added new strings for i18n
features: productdb-channel-details, productdb-channel-header, productdb-channel-manager and productdb-channel-selector-ui components for Chat SDK

fixes: In order to improve the organization of multiple buttons within the bottom control bar, some of the buttons are moved to the new <productdb-more-toggle /> component on desktop.
Fixed list of devices not being updated when a new device was added while `<productdb-settings-video />` and `<productdb-settings-video />` were already rendered
`<productdb-permission-message />` component now can be loaded outside of the <productdb-dialog-manager />.
`<productdb-chat-composer-ui />` now stores the draft message in local storage and restores it on page refresh.
Fixed an edge case where the state of the pinned participant was not getting updated when they left the meeting.
features: âœ¨ Added support for our upcoming AI features. Keep an eye out for more updates!

fixes: Removed the extra space that was being taken by `<productdb-tab-bar />` when there is only one tab.
Fixed an edge case where the `<productdb-clock />` component was mysteriously disappearing.
Fixed autoplay issues with `<productdb-livestream-player />`
features: Added observability and quality metrics collection for `<productdb-livestream-player />`

fixes: Optimized the performance of `<productdb-participants-audio />`
Fixed a style issue with `<participant-tile />` on Safari browser.
Optimized a few more components for [Breakout rooms](/guides/breakoutroom/introduction-breakout-rooms).
features: A new `dialogClose` not gets fired when you close the dialog.
Now you can pass the i18n prop `t` to `<productdb-meeting />`

fixes: Fixed an issue with angular builds.
Fixed an edge case where the host controls were not visible for a combination of `canDisableParticipantAudio` and `canDisableParticipantVideo` permissions.
Fixed an issue with text `line-height` in `<productdb-chat-messages />` when the body/html font size is defined in percentage.
Improved the spacing around sidebar heading and `<productdb-participants />` component.
features: Added support for our upcoming layout configurations. Keep an eye out for more updates!

fixes: The **stop screenshare** feature was not working when multiple users were sharing their screens simultaneously.
features: Chat in a livestreaming meeting is now paginated to handle hundreds of thousands of messages.

**Interactive Livestream Release (LL-HLS)** 
 1. Broadcast a meeting to up to 100,000 viewers with low latency of just 3 to 6 seconds.
 2. Interactive chat and polls. 
 3. Viewers can raise hands to join the stage or the host can invite viewers to join the stage. 
 For more information, see [ILS Overview](https://docs.productdb.io/guides/livestream/livestream-overview) and [Getting Started with ILS](https://docs.productdb.io/guides/livestream/getting-started-with-livestreaming).

fixes: Fixed an edge case in file name and size detection in chat.
Clap file names in chat to single line. Now long files names are truncated with ellipsis.
Optimized icons to have consistent colors.
Performance improvement for `<productdb-chat-messages-ui />` when the window is in background.
Fixed an issue with `<productdb-chat-selector-ui />` in Safari, where the component was overlapping with `<productdb-messages-ui />`.
features: `<productdb-chat-composer-ui />` now supports `disableEmojiPicker` property to disable emoji picker.

fixes: Issue with disabled state in the `productdb-control` bar-button has been resolved.
`productdb-avatar` now handles multibyte characters better and removes special characters from the name.
The dimensions of avatars in polls have been fixed.
The alignment of tab bar names has been fixed for cases where the plugin name is short.
features: `productdb-grid` now supports background color.

fixes: Double render of productdb-header and productdb-controlbar elements
Missing export for a few Angular UI Kit Components
